text: Kåre Østerdal (2 December 1917 - 21 November 1973) was a Norwegian Olympic skier from Nordland. Østerdal was born in Rana, Norway. He competed in cross- country skiing and Nordic combined at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==Cross- country skiing results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text- align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 18 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1948 || 30 || 32 || — || — |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1917 births Category:1973 deaths Category:People from Rana, Norway Category:Norwegian male cross-country skiers Category:Norwegian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Norway Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Norway Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics
title: Kåre Østerdal
